skill.name: frontend-aesthetics
skill.description: Instructions on how to design high quality frontend aesthetics
skill.summary: Instructions on how to design high quality frontend aesthetics
skill.author: Crossbill-Highlights

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. It contains only design guidance instructions for AI assistants. No filesystem access, network calls, command execution, or environment variable access detected.

content.user_title: Design distinctive frontends with aesthetic guidance
content.value_statement: AI assistants often generate generic, visually boring frontends that users call 'AI slob.' This skill provides design guidance for typography, color schemes, motion, and backgrounds to create distinctive, polished interfaces that stand out.
actual_capabilities: Select distinctive fonts that elevate visual appeal
Design cohesive color themes with strong accent colors
Create atmospheric backgrounds using CSS gradients
Apply IDE themes and cultural aesthetics for inspiration
limitations: Provides design guidance only, does not write code directly
Does not access design files or assets from your project
Cannot test designs in browser or validate accessibility
Does not integrate with design tools like Figma or Sketch

use_cases.title: Enhance app visual design
use_cases.description: Transform basic interfaces into polished, distinctive frontends with thoughtful typography and motion

use_cases.title: Quick design iterations
use_cases.description: Generate design-forward frontend mockups with creative aesthetic choices and consistent theming

use_cases.title: Improve UI consistency
use_cases.description: Apply professional design principles to ensure cohesive visual language across components

prompt_templates.title: Basic frontend polish
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a frontend for [describe your application]. Focus on distinctive typography, a cohesive color palette with strong accents, and purposeful animations.

prompt_templates.title: Theme creation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a frontend design for [use case] with a [specific aesthetic, e.g., retro terminal, modern minimal, brutalist] theme. Include CSS variables for colors and font choices.

prompt_templates.title: Animation focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a frontend with an emphasis on motion. Include page load animations, staggered reveals, and micro-interactions. Prefer CSS-only solutions.

prompt_templates.title: Atmospheric backgrounds
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a frontend with atmospheric backgrounds for [context]. Use layered gradients, geometric patterns, or contextual effects that match the overall aesthetic.

output_examples.input: Design a login page for a productivity app
output: Typography: Use a characterful serif like Playfair Display for headings, paired with a clean sans-serif for body text
Color: Deep teal base with coral accent buttons, avoiding the clichÃ©d purple-gradient-on-white
Background: Subtle mesh gradient that adds depth without distraction
Motion: Staggered fade-in for form elements, gentle button hover effect

best_practices: Choose fonts deliberately - distinctive choices like Space Grotesk or characterful serifs outperform generic defaults
Commit to cohesive themes with dominant colors and sharp accents rather than timid, evenly-distributed palettes
Focus animations on high-impact moments like page load sequences rather than scattered micro-interactions
anti_patterns: Using overused fonts like Inter, Roboto, Arial, or system fonts without intentional styling
Defaulting to purple gradients on white backgrounds or other clichÃ©d AI-generated aesthetics
Creating predictable, cookie-cutter layouts that lack context-specific character or creative vision

faq.question: Which platforms support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude Code. It may also work with other Claude-based products that support custom skills.

faq.question: Does this skill write actual code?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides design guidance and recommendations. The AI will suggest approaches while you write the implementation code.

faq.question: What font recommendations does it provide?
faq.answer: The skill avoids generic fonts like Arial and Inter. It recommends distinctive choices like Playfair Display, Space Grotesk, or other characterful typefaces.

faq.question: Is my code and design data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This prompt-based skill has no filesystem access, network calls, or code execution capabilities. It only provides design guidance.

faq.question: Why do my AI-generated frontends look generic?
faq.answer: AI assistants converge on common, safe choices. This skill counters that tendency by encouraging creative, distinctive aesthetic decisions.

faq.question: How is this different from other design skills?
faq.answer: This skill specifically targets 'AI slop' aesthetics by requiring deliberate creative choices rather than default patterns.
